mapper.sql: id, parent_id, firm_code, name, code, description, created_id, created, modified, modified_id
mapper.select: select d.id, d.parent_id, d.firm_code, d.name, d.code, d.description, d.created_id, d.created, modified, d.modified_id from department d inner join `user` u on d.id = u.department_id where u.id = #{userId}
